Action.author: rranjan3
Action.body: What is the error that is seen in case the service is run as user *sawtooth ?*

Action.author: arsulegai
Action.body: Issue was wrto "log/" folder generation for which the user "sawtooth" doesn't have permission. https://github.com/manojgop/sawtooth-poet/pull/57 will solve the issue, thanks.
